price: Por certo, haverá para os piedosos, junto de seu Senhor, os Jardins da Delícia.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
